system_description: ContosoShop – React SPA front-end with REST API in Azure App Service + SQL back-end + Service Bus for transaction decoupling.
issue_summary: Checkout process intermittently fails with 'Order Not Processed' error for multiple users.

conversation_history.message: Several customers have reported that their orders are not being processed successfully. They see an 'Order Not Processed' message after submitting payment.
Thank you for reporting the issue, Jordan. We are currently reviewing the transaction logs and monitoring the checkout workflow.
Please keep us updated, as this is impacting active sales.
Understood. We'll provide updates as soon as we identify any anomalies or root causes.
